headline: Peter Thiel, an early Facebook investor, is stepping down from Meta board
author: Catherine Garcia
sentences: In a statement, Meta Chairman and CEO Mark Zuckerberg said he was "deeply grateful" for everything Thiel has done for Facebook, "from believing in us when few others would, to teaching me so many lessons about business, economics, and the world."
Monday's announcement comes after Meta's stock price dropped 26 percent last Wednesday and the social media giant reported that last quarter, for the first time in its history, it lost daily users.
